BodRawD328.Transcription: Hyt is mery in hallwhen berdys waggyth all
BodRawD328.Note:
Translating ‘Aula gaudescit cum barbula queque
                    monescit’, which follows; English portion all written on one
                    line.
BodRawD328.Editions:
Meech,  Sanford Brown.

         38 (1940-41): 113-32: 120.
Sisam,  Celia,  and  Kenneth Sisam, eds.
